snippet: After tearfully declaring himself a disgrace, former Rhode Island House Speaker Gordon Fox was sentenced to prison and said he had been driven by greed and “just plain stupidity.”
abstract: Rhode Island House Speaker Gordon Fox is sentenced to three years in prison for corruption; had acknowledged taking more than $50,000 in bribes and plundering more than $100,000 from his campaign account.
lead_paragraph: After tearfully declaring himself a disgrace, former Rhode Island House Speaker Gordon Fox was sentenced to prison and said he had been driven by greed and “just plain stupidity.”

headline.main: Rhode Island: Former House Speaker Gets 3-Year Sentence for Corruption
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Former House Speaker Gets 3-Year Sentence for Corruption
